trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_GALIENA_000_000<tab>Well met, adventurer. My name's Galiena, and I work at the House of Splendors for my aunt Rowena.
TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_GALIENA_000_001<tab>Following her successful expansion into Idyllshire and the three city<var 1F /var>states, she's decided to bring her operations here to Rhalgr's Reach.

TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_GALIENA_000_002<tab>Our presence here serves to aid the recovery effort, creating jobs for refugees and stimulating the economy. With your skills, you would be of great help to us.

TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_GALIENA_000_003<tab>And of course, if you have any collectables, I'd be happy to take them off your hands in exchange for scrips. With locations realm-wide, it has never been easier to do business with the House of Splendors!
TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_GALIENA_000_010<tab>Well met, adventurer. If you know any able crafters or gatherers, I'd be thankful for an introduction.
TEXT_STMBDY110_02941_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 60 or above.
